attributes.action: Taking foreign aid, EU payments, legal aid grants and human rights compensation into account, tell us how many taxpayer pounds you have sent overseas
attributes.additional_details: There has to come a point in time when even the dimmest of politicians can see that what they are doing is damaging their home country and people.  Just how much will you, Dithering Dave, arrange to be paid to foreigners before you resign in igmony?
